title: Quantum Benchmarking Performance Metrics File Schema
description: Describes required fields for a valid performance metrics file.

performance_metrics_uuid.title: Performance Metrics UUID
performance_metrics_uuid.description: The UUID of the performance metrics file as a string in 8-4-4-4-12 format.

solution_uuid.title: Solution UUID
solution_uuid.description: The UUID of the solution that the performance metrics were calculated for.  A string in 8-4-4-4-12 format.

problem_instance_uuid.title: Problem Instance UUID
problem_instance_uuid.description: The UUID of the problem instance that the solution is based on.

creation_timestamp.title: Creation Timestamp
creation_timestamp.description:
Timestamp in ISO 8601 format in UTC (note the `Z`).

Examples:  
`2022-12-25T18:00:02.223Z`,
`2022-12-25T07:18:45Z`

short_name.title: Short Name
short_name.description: A short string.  Not necessarily unique.

performance_metrics_calculator_details.title: Performance Metrics Calculator Details
performance_metrics_calculator_details.description: Information on the type/version and attribution of the software used to evaluate the solution file and produce the performance metrics.

solution_calculated_within_time_limit.title: Solution Calculated Within Time Limit?
solution_calculated_within_time_limit.description: A boolean to identify if the solution was calculated within the required time limit.

solution_submitted_by_due_date.title: Solution Within Due Date?
solution_submitted_by_due_date.description: A boolean to identify if the solution was submitted by the required due date.  If there was no due date specified, then this is `true`.

performance_metrics.title: Performance Metrics Object
performance_metrics.description: An object holding the various performance metrics calculated.  The exact structure is TBD and will change based on type of problem (GSEE, QUANTUM_DYNAMICS, DIFFERENTIAL_EQUATIONS, etc).
